1037370.name: Jigsaw Masterpieces : Kawaii Cute Goddesses
1037370.description:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Kawaii Cute Goddesses" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Nike - Goddess of Victory -
  • Mercury - Goddess of Financial Gain -
  • Amaterasu - Goddess of the Sun -
  • Nyx - Goddess of the Night -
  • Janus - Goddess of Gates and Doors -
  • Chrono - Goddess of Time -
  • Tsukuyomi - Goddess of the Moon -
  • Thanatos - Goddess of Death -
  • Heimdallr - Goddess of Lights -
  • Yata-Garasu - Incarnation of the Sun -
